props.name: autoComplete
props.description: This prop helps users to fill forms faster

props.name: autoFocus
props.description: If true, the input element will be focused during the first mount

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the component

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value of the input element

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the input element will be disabled

props.name: error
props.description: If true, the label will be displayed in an error state

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container

props.name: helperText
props.description: The helper text content

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the input element

props.name: label
props.description: The label content

props.name: multiline
props.description: If true, a textarea element will be rendered instead of an input

props.name: name
props.description: Name attribute of the input element

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the value is changed

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The short hint displayed in the input before the user enters a value

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the label is displayed as required

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of rows to display when multiline option is set to true

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the text field

props.name: type
props.description: Type of the input element

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the input element

props.name: variant
props.description: The variant to use
